data.text: @lokeshpancholi Sir, we’re constantly optimizing our schedule, and we will have your feedback sent to our Route Planning Team. Keep a track of our website.~Vaishali

urls.title: Conditions of Carriage, Passenger & Baggage | IndiGo
urls.description: For each flight booked on goIndiGo.in, there are general conditions of carriage applicable for carriage of passengers and baggage.

data.text: @rohit_singh1409 For more information, kindly refer to the link https://t.co/GXY8D9wHuJ Clause 11.6 "Collection and delivery of baggage". We look forward to your kind understanding. ~Vaishali (2/2)

@rohit_singh1409 Sir, we regret the experience! However, all cases of mishandled baggage need to be reported at the destination airport so we can further assist the passenger. Since this was not reported hence we're not in the position to take this up further. (1/2)

data.text: #goIndiGo from Mumbai. Book now https://t.co/fpGNYKu4BH https://t.co/wXzuUrrr46
@shailendra1976_ Always here to assist you. ~Navi
@shafkat_shafi Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will update you.~Vaishali
@Mizan2earth Sir, we regret the inconvenience. Please allow us some time to get it checked. We will get back to you.~Vaishali
@ashutoshrsp Sir, we regret the inconvenience. We've shared the feedback with the concerned team for review and rectification.~Vaishali
@AdityaK999 Sir, we know it's taking longer than usual. Our team is working on it. Please bear with us in this interim.~Vaishali
@reeshav_dey Sir, we regret the inconvenience caused. As checked, you have completed your journey. We hope to serve you better in the future. ~Ojasvi
@pushparaj10 We regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us your PNR(s) so we may check on the same and assist you. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@SudhakerJadhav Mr Jadhav, we regret the experience and will have your feedback shared with our concerned team to avoid re-occurrence. Looking forward to serving you in a better way, next time you travel with us. ~Navi

@IamUD10 Sir, as checked, the refund has been processed to the primary mode of payment on the 31st of October, 2022. Please visit https://t.co/m513NEgQJu to track your refund status. We request you get in touch with the relevant travel agency for further clarification. ~Ojasvi

@garvibaldua Ma'am, we regret the delay in response. As we are receiving a high volume of mentions we could not cater to your query on time. Let us know via DM if further assistance is needed. Also, looking forward to serving you with a seamless experience next time.~Vaishali

@jena5_sonukumar Sir, as checked, the refund has been processed to the primary mode of payment. Please visit https://t.co/m513NEgQJu to track your refund status. We request you get in touch with the relevant travel agency for further clarification. ~Ojasvi
@shivadhar Sir, we are concerned to know about this and regret the inconvenience. Please share your PNR via DM so we may raise the issue with the concerned team, ~Ojasvi
@Aditya63321930 Sir, please be informed that there is a shuttle bus service from Terminal 3 to Terminal 1 at Delhi airport or you may also take a cab to reach faster. Thank you.~Vaishali
@IndiGo6E Rest, we request you to delete your tweet having the PNR as the same contains Confidential Info. Thanks. (2/2) ~Navi

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: @iamMST016 Mr Thakur, we see the Web Check-In is already done in your booking. Do let us know via DM in case you need more assistance and we look forward to having you onboard. (1/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@Pankajsam86 In case you are interested to apply for a position with IndiGo, you may apply on our official Careers page for a suitable position at https://t.co/PJhMUGZ7Qx (2/2)  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@Pankajsam86 Sir, we confirm that the information you have provided is clearly fake / does not belong to IndiGo. You may share the documents with us via DM. It appears that certain people are fraudulently trying to collect money from you on the basis of a fake job offer. (1/2)

urls.title: Baggage Policy - IndiGo
urls.description: Know more about IndiGo Baggage Policy at goIndiGo.in website.

data.text: @ItsMeAkshayy Sir, we understand your concern, however, per person, only one piece of Hand Baggage is allowed. You may visit https://t.co/R4Ul7gMc79 for more info on the same. Thanks. ~Navi
@sureshtodi Definitely no sir, could you please share your PNR via DM, so we shall check with the concerned team and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@RobinSaini Sir, we regret to see this. We request you to share your PNR and the complaint acknowledgment copy (PIR) via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@RAJ1209 Sir, we request you to share your concern in detail via DM so, we may look into it and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@karanjasani3005 Hello, we regret the inconvenience caused to you. Please know that we do not provide terminal change services, however taxi services are available. You may ask the airport staff for assistance. ~Diyashi
@RajeevM1951 Sir, please share the 7-digit case reference number via DM so, we may expedite the process.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@MastMagan Sir, please know there is no target list or anything. Sharing your PNR shall help us to assist and look in the matter in more detailed way, Thank you. ~Diyashi
@piyushsdaga Hello, as checked voucher have been issued under the registered email id. Please check. ~Diyashi
@delhigirlinjpr Sir, we believe one of our representatives addressed your concern via call and assisted you in the best possible way. ~Prahlad
@Diya_1505 Ma'am, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check with our concerned team and will get back to you with an update.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

urls.title: Baggage Allowance, IndiGo Baggage Allowance | IndiGo
urls.description: Get the detailed information on Indigo baggage allowance for your all domestic flights as well as international flights. Know the number and weight of baggage prices you are allowed to carry during your journey.

data.text: @IBiswajitGuha Sir, you may visit https://t.co/rMOvTYQyYy for more information.~ Nandita
@dr_tewari Hello, we regret to hear this. We never entertain rude behavior of our employees. Please know we are raising the issue to the concerned team for the necessary actions. ~Diyashi

@Nishantbolte Mr Kumar, we regret to hear this. Rude behavior is something we do not tolerate. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we check and proceed further. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@SJxPrince Sir, free seats are subject to availability as the same is limited in inventory. Charges are only for preferred seat selection. We advice our customers to pre-book the desired seats online with minimum applicable charges to avoid last-minute hassle.~ Nandita
@kingofsomeheart We have noted your feedback sir, and shall raise the same to the concerned team. Thank you. ~Diyashi

urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @Saurabh07nov Sir, please know RTPCR test is not required. For more information you may check our international travel guidelines by clicking on https://t.co/Zcu6qrWQZV . ~Diyashi
@Amit147946 We regret on the delay in response. We believe our customer relations team has contacted and assisted with the concern.  We hope to serve better in future. ~Shreya
@JonathanVeerak1 We regret the inconvenience sir, we are getting this checked. allow us some time to get it checked and get back yo you with an update.

@anjulal1 Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused. Please know that gate change comes under the purview of the concerned airport authority and is subject to change at any point. Further, you may reach out to our airport staff for real-time assistance.~ Nandita
@aitrivedi Hello, as checked, check-in has already been done. Hoping to serve you better  in future. ~Diyashi

@kingofsomeheart This is not something we want our passengers to face sir. The seat cushion gets adrift from its Velcro at times. The same can be repositioned with the help of our crew. However, we are sharing your feedback with the concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. ~Diyashi

#goIndiGo

@kumarpappu912 Sir, our check-in counters close 60 minutes prior to the time of scheduled departure, past which, our team will not be able to accept you on-board in the same flight. We look forward to your understanding on the same. ~Yashica

urls.title: Flight Status - Flight tracker, Check live departure & arrival time | IndiGo
urls.description: Track live flight status for departure and arrival time. Enter your flight pnr or booking details to know the updated flight status and plan your travel accordingly.

data.text: @saritray2001 Sir, as of now, there are no changes in the flight schedule of 6E 751. Please stay tuned to https://t.co/rpnOvAP5FT to keep a track of flight status. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@uniqueashu29 Sir, we request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@HAnsariSP Mr Ansari, we understand that spotting an insect on-board is definitely upsetting and we take such feedback seriously. While all our aircrafts undergo fumigation before every flight departure, you can always reach out to our crew for immediate assistance. ~Yashica
@himanshudas02 Mr Das, please share your PNR with us over DM, we would like to look into this further and raise it for review with our team. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@anmolg2009 Mr Gupta, we request you to share your PNR with us via DM so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@prasanjit1986 Hi, we have reverted to your DM box. ~Yashica
@JSKMPH_TGP We are happy to assist you. Wishing you a pleasant flight. ~Yashica
@Jxpooja1 We request you to share your PNR with us over DM so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@krPradeep Mr Kumar, we are glad to be able to assist and hope the journey was comfortable. We assure you, your suggestion will be shared with our concerned team for review. Looking forward to welcoming you, ma'am and the little one on-board again soon.💙 ~Yashica

#goIndiGo

@TejasSanjayDes1 Mr Deshpande, it is not our intent to disrupt our customers' travel plans. We request you to share with us your PNR via DM so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@MukeshKmicky Mr Kumar, thank you for your kind appreciation. We will surely share your compliments with our teammate Yashi and hope you had a pleasant flight. Looking forward to welcoming you on-board again soon.✈️ ~Yashica

#goIndiGo

@AdityaS02959243 We request you to also share your PNR with us via DM so we can share this further with our team for further action. Hoping to provide you with a better experience on your future flights with us. ~Yashica <2/2>  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@AdityaS02959243 Sir, we understand that spotting an insect on-board is definitely upsetting and we take such feedback seriously. While all our aircrafts undergo fumigation before every flight departure, you can always reach out to our crew for immediate assistance. <1/2>
@JSKMPH_TGP Yes, Sir. Both the power bank and mobile charger have to be carried in your cabin luggage. ~Yashica
@KaifiAhmad786 Sir, please allow us some time to get this checked and we will update you at the earliest. ~Yashica
@DhageHoshang Sir, we are concerned to take note of this and request you to share your contact details with us over DM so we can look into this further. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@JSKMPH_TGP You can carry your deodorant or perfume in both, check-in as well as in hand luggage. In the case of hand luggage, the maximum volume of the liquid should not exceed 100 ml. ~Yashica

data.text: @mishravishrut31 Mr Mishra, we regret to take note of this and assure you this will be highlighted to our concerned team for further action. Hoping to provide you with a better experience on your future flights with us. ~Yashica

@Garrychabba9 Sir, our team is getting this checked and we will update you as soon as we find your belongings. Your patience during this interim is highly appreciated. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@TUsharJ12136436 Mr Jain, we request you to kindly share with us your PNR over DM so we can assist you. ~Yashica  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@mayukh77 Mr Bhattacharya, we try our best to be on schedule and not cause our customers any discomfort. We regret the inconvenience caused due to this delay. The flight is expected to be airborne shortly and as of now the updated time of departure is 2355 hours. ~Yashica
@JSKMPH_TGP Hi, you can carry the Bluetooth Speaker in both, Check-In and Hand Luggage. ~Navi

@twarit_upadhyay Mr Upadhyay, we regret the inconvenience caused. Your flight is delayed due to the Late Arrival of Incoming Aircraft and is expected to depart at 2355 hrs. Our Airport Team is there to assist the passengers and you may get in touch with them for any real-time assistance. ~Navi

@Ahm_brahmasmi_ Ma'am, web check-in isn't mandatory for International Flights and our Airport Team will assist you with the Check-In Procedures, free of cost. Please report at the Check-In Counters, 120 to 90 mins prior of the flight departure time. Thanks. ~Navi
@oldskoolbastard Mr Chaudhary, you can carry the 27-inch Monitor in your Checked-In Luggage without any extra charges. Please ensure to pack it properly to avoid any damage. Thanks. ~Navi
@pradhan_kritin You're most welcome. 😊 ~Navi
@RebelloAnil We regret the inconvenience and request you to DM us the PNR so we may check and assist. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@vasudha1 Ms Sahgal, we regret the experience and request you to allow us some time to look into this. You may DM us for further communication on your raised concern. Thanks. ~Navi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@Pankaj607 Mr Jain, you can carry the Induction Stove in your Check-In Luggage. ~Navi
